returns.nft1155: Address of the shared ERC-1155 collection
returns.nft721: Address of the shared ERC-721 collection

params.maxSupply: Maximum supply for this token (0 = unlimited)
params.price: Listing price per edition in wei
params.quantityToList: Number of editions to list (must be <= amount)

mintAndList721(string,uint256).details: User must have approved this helper contract via setApprovalForAll before calling

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Required to receive ERC1155 tokens in batches

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

isApproved(address).notice: Check if user has approved this helper for their singles NFTs

mintAndList1155(uint256,uint256,string,u.notice: Mint ERC-1155 editions and list them on the marketplace

mintAndList721(string,uint256).notice: Mint a single ERC-721 NFT and list it on the marketplace
